metadata.title: CVE-2022-22620 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.2.1, iOS 15.3.1 and iPadOS 15.3.1,Safari 15.3 (v. 16612.4.9.1.8 and 15612.4.9.1.8). Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware ofa report that this issue may have been actively exploited..

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22620` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.35.90-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.35.90-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
